description: Valve Half-Life is a first-person shooter and puzzle-solving game in which players must escape from a research facility while fighting off aliens. The game uses assets saved in a variety of proprietary file formats, including the SPR format. (The PS2 version of Half-Life instead uses sprites saved as .SPZ files.)

Half-Life modders sometimes modify or replace the game's default SPR files. This allows them to customize how in-game objects appear.
